    • Method Detail

      • baseCommand

        public static void baseCommand(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
               java.lang.String[] args,
               java.lang.String gameName,
               java.lang.String cmdPerm,
               java.lang.String adminPerm,
               java.lang.String setPerm)
        A built in method for handling minigame commands so that other minigames plugins do not need to code in the general commands. This only handles commands built into the API, additional commands must be handled externally in another plugin.
        Parameters:
        sender - The sender of the command
        args - The command args.
        gameName - The name of the game, this is generally not needed but should be added.
        cmdPerm - The permission to use any minigame commands.
        adminPerm - The permission to use any admin related commands.
        setPerm - The permission to use any set related commands.
